category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_allow_project_admins_modify_rules
preference.preference_description: Allows project administrators (who are not a member of the dba group) to edit project related access rules in the Project Administration application. Valid values are: * true: all project administrators are allowed to edit the access rules. * false: only project administrators who are part of dba group are allowed to edit the access rules. This is the default value.
